passages.text:
You stand on a highway, the ashfalt broken down by water over time. As you walk down it, you notice an old human city, degraded by time. You could walk forward down the road to reach the city.
[[Go Forward->Broken Street]]
passages.name: Eroded Highway

passages.text:
You walk down a broken street, the pavement broken and uneven by some sort of earthquake. Tree roots could be seen growing through the cracked concrete.
To one side of the street is a broken building, with large roots growing over the piles of metal, brick, and glass. Farther down the road, a tunnel into a subway station can be seen. An abandoned restaurant can be seen on the other side of the street.
[[Go Left->Shattered Building]] 
[[Go Forward->Unstable Stairs]] 
[[Go Right->Abandoned Restaraunt]]
passages.name: Broken Street

passages.text:
You enter a building that has mostly collapsed, the roots you've seen growing through the road winding through the broken windows and cracked bricks. The piles of rubble barely conceal a back-alley, easily accessible by a hole in the building's wall. You could also go out of the building and back to the broken road.
[[Go Right->Back Alley]] 
[[Go Back->Broken Street]]
passages.name: Shattered Building

passages.text:
You walk down a staircase of uneasy hunks of concrete, each piece you step on wobbling under your feet. You could go down deeper, into the subway itself, or you could go back up the stairs.
[[Go Forward->Subway Tunnel]] 
[[Go Back->Broken Street]]
passages.name: Unstable Stairs

passages.text:
You walk down a back alley that has hardened hunks of trash all over the ground. The trash is so old, it seems to have become part of the ground.

There is no other way to go besides back, as a metal fence, congealed with hardened trash, blocks your way.
[[Go Back->Shattered Building]]
passages.name: Back Alley

passages.text:
This Subway Tunnel has large roots growing through the ceiling, reaching the ground & uprooting the tracks. It's dark, and you worry you might lose your way.
[[Go Back->Unstable Stairs]]
passages.name: Subway Tunnel

passages.text:
An abandoned restaraunt. The booths lie empty, with some having holes made by the roots you've been noticing around here. You could go out to the back, which is missing a door, or you could go back to the street.
[[Go forward->Back of the Restaraunt]] 
[[Go Back->Broken Street]]
passages.name: Abandoned Restaraunt

passages.text:
The back of the restaraunt has a large amount of food crates, the spoiled meat giving the room a pervasive odor that stings your nose. Under a crate is a mass of roots, with a single skeletal arm poking out. The body must have been crushed by the crate, and the roots came and began absorbing the precious nutrients from it soon after.
There's no place to go but back to the restaraunt proper.
[[Go back->Abandoned Restaraunt]]
passages.name: Back of the Restaraunt
